question.text: You are in a tunnel and you see this sign. What does it mean?

explanation.text: If you have to leave your vehicle in a tunnel and leave by an emergency exit, do so as quickly as you can. Follow the signs directing you to the nearest exit point. If there are several people using the exit, don’t panic but try to leave in a calm and orderly manner.

answer.text: Beware of pedestrians, no footpath ahead
